name: get-videos-done
description: VideoFlow - AI Video Production System powered by kie.ai + ElevenLabs + Remotion

scripts.render: npx remotion render src/index.ts MainVideo out/video.mp4
scripts.render:shorts: npx remotion render src/index.ts MainVideoVertical out/video-shorts.mp4
scripts.render:square: npx remotion render src/index.ts MainVideoSquare out/video-square.mp4
